title: American_Top_40_1978_July_1st_Top_40_Recording_Acts_Of_The_Seven
description:
"You're listening to a special countdown of the artists who have dominated the charts since AT40's first countdown back in 1970."


American Top 40 with Casey Kasem aired on radio from July 4, 1970 until August 6, 1988. This recording is one I found on the internet. It is a broadcast from Sirius XM. This is not a Premier Radio Networks edit so there are no extras.

Originally broadcast on July 1st, 1978, this is American Top 40's Top 50 Acts of the Seventies. At one point Casey explains, "We rank the acts by giving them points for each hit song based on its position in the survey for each week it is on." Supposedly the AT40 staff figured that this far into the decade, no late-comers could compete with this forty.

Enjoy!
